```r
library(HealthMarkers)
options(healthmarkers.verbose = "inform")

df <- data.frame(
  TC=runif(100,4,7), LDL_c=runif(100,2,4), HDL_c=runif(100,1,2), TG=runif(100,0.8,2.5),
  ALT=rnorm(100,30,10), AST=rnorm(100,25,8), BMI=rnorm(100,27,4), sex=sample(c("M","F"),100,TRUE),
  diabetes=sample(0:1,100,TRUE), insulin=runif(100,5,25), MetS=sample(0:1,100,TRUE),
  GSH=rnorm(100,1200,200), GSSG=rnorm(100,20,5),
  eGFR=runif(100,45,110), UACR=exp(rnorm(100, log(25), 0.7))
)

col_map <- list(
  TC="TC", LDL_c="LDL_c", HDL_c="HDL_c", TG="TG",
  ALT="ALT", AST="AST", BMI="BMI", sex="sex", diabetes="diabetes", insulin="insulin", MetS="MetS",
  GSH="GSH", GSSG="GSSG",
  eGFR="eGFR", UACR="UACR"
)

lip <- atherogenic_indices(df, col_map)
liv <- liver_fat_markers(df, col_map)
ox  <- oxidative_markers(df, col_map)
ckd <- ckd_stage(df, col_map)

summary <- list(
  lipid = marker_summary(lip),
  liver = marker_summary(liv),
  oxidative = marker_summary(ox),
  renal = marker_summary(ckd)
)

summary
```
